channel.title: I need some Script item codes!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need the item codes for teh following:
(1) Red Partyhat (2) Dragon Chainmail (3) Dragon Square Shield (4) Dragon Legs (5) Dragonstone Amulet (6) Abbysal Whip
Help is appreciated! Thx in advance! :)

item.title: I need some Script item codes!
item.dc:creator: @r3tch3d_m16 r3tch3d_m16
item.description:
@r3tch3d_m16 wrote:

Well, I need the ACTUAL codes for the items individually. Such as a yellow Party Hat would be ::pickup 1040 1. WHich is the only one I actually know.

Read full topic
item.source: I need some Script item codes!

item.title: I need some Script item codes!
item.dc:creator: @ritacame ritacame
item.description:
@ritacame wrote:

Open the Mopar Client, go too Help then Command List. It should open up a .xml with all the codes in it. Control F your items, and you should find them. GO to mopar then ::pickup CODE.

Hope that helped.

Read full topic
item.source: I need some Script item codes!
